sourcesContent:
// src/components/admin/reports/PerformanceMetrics.jsx import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { TrendingUp, Clock, Package, Truck, AlertCircle, Calendar, IndianRupee, Download, Filter } from 'lucide-react'; import { Line, Bar } from 'recharts'; import { adminService } from '../../../services/adminService'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../common/LoadingSpinner'; const PerformanceMetrics = () => { const [metrics, setMetrics] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState('30'); // days const [view, setView] = useState('overview'); // overview, delivery, revenue useEffect(() => { fetchMetrics(); }, [dateRange]); const fetchMetrics = async () => { try { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/admin/metrics?range=${dateRange}`, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('authToken')}` } }); const data = await response.json(); if (!response.ok) throw new Error(data.message); setMetrics(data); } catch (err) { setError(err.message); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) return ; if (error) { return (
{error}
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Performance Metrics

{/* Metric Cards */}
{/* Delivery Success Rate */}

Success Rate

{metrics?.successRate.toFixed(1)}%

{metrics?.deliveredCount} of {metrics?.totalShipments} delivered

{/* Average Delivery Time */}

Avg Delivery Time

{metrics?.avgDeliveryTime.toFixed(1)} hrs

Target: 72 hours

{/* Revenue per Shipment */}

Avg Revenue/Shipment

{metrics?.avgRevenue.toFixed(2)}

Total: {metrics?.totalRevenue.toLocaleString()}

{/* Failed Deliveries */}

Failed Deliveries

{metrics?.failedCount}

{((metrics?.failedCount / metrics?.totalShipments) * 100).toFixed(1)}% of total

{/* Charts */}
{/* Delivery Performance Chart */}

Delivery Performance

{/* Revenue Trends Chart */}

Revenue Trends

{/* Detailed Metrics */}

Detailed Analysis

{view === 'overview' && (
{/* Status Distribution */}

Status Distribution

{Object.entries(metrics?.statusDistribution || {}).map(([status, count]) => (
{status} {count}
))}
{/* Zone Performance */}

Zone Performance

{metrics?.zonePerformance?.map((zone) => (
{zone.name} = 90 ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800' : zone.performance >= 75 ? 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800' : 'bg-red-100 text-red-800' }`}> {zone.performance}% Success
Avg. Delivery Time {zone.avgDeliveryTime} hrs
Total Shipments {zone.shipments}
))}
)} {view === 'delivery' && (
{/* Delivery Time Analysis */}

Delivery Time Distribution

{/* Failure Analysis */}

Delivery Failure Analysis

{metrics?.failureReasons?.map((reason) => (
{reason.type}

{reason.description}

{reason.count}
{((reason.count / metrics.failedCount) * 100).toFixed(1)}% of failures
))}
)} {view === 'revenue' && (
{/* Revenue Breakdown */}

Revenue Breakdown

Total Revenue
{metrics?.totalRevenue.toLocaleString()}
{((metrics?.revenueGrowth || 0) * 100).toFixed(1)}% from last period
Average per Shipment
{metrics?.avgRevenue.toFixed(2)}
Based on {metrics?.totalShipments} shipments
Top Performing Zone
{metrics?.topZone?.name}
{metrics?.topZone?.revenue.toLocaleString()} in revenue
{/* Weight Distribution */}

Weight-based Analysis

)}
{/* Export Options */}
); }; export default PerformanceMetrics;
